summary: This code downloads an audio example, separates it into two components using Spleeter's 2-stems model, and saves the results in separate files. However, there seems to be an issue with the second separation process.

details.comment: This code downloads an audio example, separates it into two components using Spleeter's 2-stems model, and saves the results in separate files. However, there seems to be an issue with the second separation process.
details.content:
# wget https://github.com/deezer/spleeter/raw/master/audio_example.mp3
# separate the example audio into two components
python3 -m spleeter separate -p spleeter:2stems -o output you_got_me.mp3
python3 -m spleeter separate -p spleeter:2stems -o output tarot_desc.mp3
# seems not working at all
